channel.title: About - We fight with cards on We fight with cards - Weekly newsletter about Digital Card Games
channel.description: Recent content in About - We fight with cards on We fight with cards - Weekly newsletter about Digital Card Games

item.title: Shadowverse Next shakes up the game
item.description: Shadowverse is a manga-style digital CCG available on mobile and Steam. The game took the world by storm, counting over 14 million downloads. Set Rotation! New class: Portalcraft All changes December 28 Plus a new set! In-game Tournaments in 2018 Big news this week for Shadowverse players: developer CyGames showcased their set of announcements, dubbed "Shadowverse Next", which are bound to shake up the game in December.

item.title: MTG Arena Developer Q&A
item.description: MTG: Arena is a new digital CCG in Wizard's Magic: the Gathering family. We're covering all the latest updates in our Arena series. Jump to: Cards - Beta info - Timeline - FAQs Best of 1 Ladder in November Beta Best of 3 + sideboard is next Closed beta is Under NDA until 2018 PC Only for now Sign up for the Beta here The MTG: Arena team held a Q&A session on Twitch about the upcoming beta.

item.title: MTG Arena beta timeline
item.description: MTG: Arena is a new digital CCG in Wizard's Magic: the Gathering family. We're covering all the latest updates in our Arena series. Jump to: Cards - Beta info - Timeline - FAQs Dev streams in October on Twitch Closed NDA beta starts in November Streaming allowed early 2018 PC Only for now Launches in 2018 The MTG: Arena team is gearing up for the Closed Beta with a series of streams in which they talk more about the game.

item.title: MTG: Arena Questions answered
item.description: MTG: Arena is an upcoming free-to-play digital CCG in Wizard's Magic: the Gathering family. Closed beta starts in November All cards from Ixalan set All Standard sets at launch Focused on 1v1 battles PC Only for now Launches in 2018 Fun times ahead: MTG Arena starts closed beta soon, and this means we get more info about the game. Follow along as we try to answer all your questions about gameplay details, cards and sets, game types and more.

item.title: Magic the Gathering: Arena
item.description: MTG: Arena is a new digital CCG in Wizard's Magic: the Gathering family. Here's all the info we have on the launch, cards and sets, game types, FAQs and more. Jump to: Cards - Beta info - Timeline - FAQs Closed beta starts in November PC Only for now Launches in 2018 All cards from Ixalan set All Standard sets at launch Focused on 1v1 battles Hearthstone took the world by storm and gave new life to what seemed to be an established genre.

item.title: A guide to Elder Scrolls: Legends for Hearthstone players
item.description: original article by /u/Karandor Do you need a break from Hearthstone? Is the SmOrC too much? Does the Lich King put you off with his icy puns? Then look no further than The Elder Scrolls: Legends, the CCG set in the popular TES universe. The new Skyrim expansion is out and the skies are full of dragons, so there's no better time to join the fray! This guide will get you started in no time.

item.title: Issue #15 - First interview!
item.description: new design / CCG & profit share / our first interview We fight with cards Issue #15 / July 28, 2017 // View in your browser The new site is up! To kick things off, I published my first interview: I talked Card City Nights with Joel from Ludosity. Check it out!

item.title: Welcome to Frivolity
item.description: If you’re a fan of card games, you probably heard of Card City Nights by now. Released back in 2014, the quirky card game was a mash-up featuring characters from Ludosity’s other games, reimagined as card players. With an interesting core mechanic, stellar soundtrack and spiffy characters, the game was well-received and still provides a refreshing experience 3 years later. So naturally, fans are eagerly awaiting the sequel! The upcoming Card City Nights 2 launches September 1 on Steam.

item.title: About - We fight with cards
item.description: About Hello! I'm Vlad, nice to meet you! I'm a software developer and consultant. I play Hearthstone regularly, but I wanted to get into other card games as well. I thought of doing this newsletter to discover a new game with a good community and keep up to date. What kind of content will I get? I plan to include the most relevant links & updates from the community. These can be reddit posts, blog posts, developer updates, state of the meta etc.

item.title: Card City Nights 2 Beta keys - We fight with cards
item.description: Card City Nights 2 All the updates on the anticipated game & open beta keys! Epic space adventure meets Card battles in the follow-up to fan favourite Card City Nights. Let's dig in and see what the fuss is all about (hint: it's a lot!) Multiplayer Beta Let's kick it off with the best news of all: Card City Nights 2 has online multiplayer! The most requested feature from the first game is here, and you will be able to play with friends for the first time.

item.title: Intro to Gwent and Gwent Public Beta - We fight with cards
item.description: Get your Gwent on! Everything you need to get started with Gwent This week, everybody can join in the fun & games of Gwent, the Witcher card came. Game intro Gwent is the acclaimed Witcher 3 card game, and Open Beta just started for Playstation 4, PC/Windows and XBox One. Lead one of the five iconic factions and outsmart your opponent in a best-out-of-3 match. To win a match, you need to score more points than your opponent.

item.title: Thanks! We'll be in touch - We fight with cards
item.description: Got it! You are confirmed. The newsletter goes out every Monday — stay tuned for the next one. See the latest issue now PS: I want to hear your thoughts! Catch me on twitter: @FightWithCards, or shoot me a line at vlad@wefightwithcards.com

item.title: Thanks! We'll be in touch - We fight with cards
item.description: Almost there. You just need to confirm your email address. You should receive an email shortly Just click on the link in the email you just received*. This helps to stop spam! After that, you'll receive your first issue in the coming Monday. * No email? Use the panel and let's chat. drift.on('ready',function(api, payload) { api.sidebar.open(); });

item.title: Weekly newsletter for CCGs - We fight with cards
item.description: Your weekly source of news, clips and banter about card games. Thanks for joining us! You'll receive an email shortly — please click the link inside to confirm. You'll get the newsletter on Mondays. Until then, stay in touch on Twitter! I want: Hearthstone Gwent Shadowverse Eternal Elder Scrolls Legends Faeria JOIN!
